original_text: The soldiers also took two other men out of the prison. These men had done bad things. The soldiers would kill them and Jesus together.
korean_text: 또 다른 두 행악자도 사형을 받게 되어 예수와 함께 끌려 가니라

sentences.original_text: The soldiers also took two other men
sentences.korean_translation: 군인들 또한 다른 두 남자를 데려왔다

sentences.original_text: These men had done bad things
The soldiers would kill them and Jesus together
sentences.korean_translation: 군인들은 그들과 예수를 함께 죽일 것이었다
